languages.text: "Местные механизмы — уродливая скверноточивая аберрация священной Технологии. Но... возможно ли узреть в искривленном зеркале истинный облик того, что отражается в нем?"
"The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"
languages.original_text: "Местные механизмы — уродливая скверноточивая аберрация священной Технологии. Но... возможно ли узреть в искривленном зеркале истинный облик того, что отражается в нем?"

traits.locale_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"
"The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"
"The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"
"The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

languages.text: “科摩罗的机械装置以某种丑恶而下流的形式曲解了神圣技术，然而……遭到扭曲的镜子，是否能照出事物的真实面貌呢？”
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗的机械装置以某种丑恶而下流的形式曲解了神圣技术，然而……遭到扭曲的镜子，是否能照出事物的真实面貌呢？”

languages.text: « Les mécanismes locaux sont d'ignobles aberrations au regard de la technologie sacrée. Mais... un miroir déformé peut-il jamais refléter fidèlement ce qui lui fait face ? »
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: « Les mécanismes locaux sont d'ignobles aberrations au regard de la technologie sacrée. Mais... un miroir déformé peut-il jamais refléter fidèlement ce qui lui fait face ? »

languages.text: «Los mecanismos locales son una aberración espantosa e inmunda de la sagrada tecnología, pero... ¿puede un espejo retorcido reflejar el verdadero rostro de lo que en él se mira?».
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: «Los mecanismos locales son una aberración espantosa e inmunda de la sagrada tecnología, pero... ¿puede un espejo retorcido reflejar el verdadero rostro de lo que en él se mira?».

languages.text: 「局所的な機構は醜く、品がないゆえ神聖な技術とは言いがたい。だが…ゆがんだ鏡に映ったものの素顔は映せるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: 「局所的な機構は醜く、品がないゆえ神聖な技術とは言いがたい。だが…ゆがんだ鏡に映ったものの素顔は映せるだろうか？」

languages.text: "Die lokalen Mechanismen sind eine schändliche, infame Abweichung von heiliger Technologie. Aber ... kann ein Zerrspiegel überhaupt jemals das wahre Gesicht dessen zeigen, was sich in ihm spiegelt?"
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: "Die lokalen Mechanismen sind eine schändliche, infame Abweichung von heiliger Technologie. Aber ... kann ein Zerrspiegel überhaupt jemals das wahre Gesicht dessen zeigen, was sich in ihm spiegelt?"

languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

languages.text: "Yerel mekanizmalar, kutsal Teknolojinin iğrenç ve kâfirce işlenmiş sapkınlık örnekleri gibi. Fakat... Çarpık bir ayna, yansıttığı şeyin gerçek yüzünü gösterebilir mi ki?"
languages.original_text: "The local mechanisms are a hideous, scurrilous aberration of sacred Technology. But... can a twisted mirror ever show the true face of what is reflected in it?"

traits.locale_text: "Yerel mekanizmalar, kutsal Teknoloji'nin iğrenç ve kâfirce işlenmiş sapkınlık örnekleri gibi. Fakat çarpık bir ayna,yansıttığı şeyin gerçek yüzünü gösterebilir mi ki?"
